course_description: This is a standard first semester Differential Equations course which covers first and second-order differential equations and systems of differential equations, with an emphasis placed on developing techniques for solving differential equations.
prerequisites: MATH 112 or MATH 112S or MATH 112Z or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
